name: Kaboom Cards
description:
Artist: Max & Laurie

Developer: Laurie

Font: Monkopus (check his itch page for harmonic)

Some Art: Kenny.nl

This game is my first finished game and my first game jam game.

click on the cards to match two cards of the same value. After 3 mins hopefully an animation will play. This is the end but i am not good with popups so i didn't make one.
